message.content:
cs.IT, cs.SY, cs.NI, cs.DC, cs.LG. 

The paper deals with the problem of stabilizing an unstable plant over a noisy communication link, which involves concepts from information theory, control systems, and networking. Therefore, cs.IT (Information Theory) and cs.SY (Systems and Control) are the most likely sub-categories. The paper also mentions problems of distributed control and networked control systems, which suggests cs.NI (Networking and Internet Architecture) and cs.DC (Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing) as possible sub-categories. Finally, the paper discusses the efficacy of the proposed method through several examples, which could be relevant to cs.LG (Machine Learning).
